channel.title: Ecosystems on MK Lau
channel.description: Recent content in Ecosystems on MK Lau

item.title: Published! Regime shifts in a microecosytem
item.description: My manuscript on the dynamics of the pitcher plant microecosystem just got accepted at Ecological Modeling! You can view a pre-print here.

item.title: Genes to ecosystems
item.description: I conducted my doctoral dissertation research at Northern Arizona University NAU in the Biological Sciences Department. I worked primarily with Dr. Thomas G. Whitham’s Cottonwood Ecology Group in association with the Merriem-Powell Center for Environmental Research.
